meanings.sent1: The huggers at the party made everyone feel warm and happy.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the best huggers in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The little girl called her teddy bear a huggers because it always made her feel better.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of handshakes, be a huggers spreading love and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The image of the huggers embracing each other stayed in their memories for years.

meanings.definition: A device or material used to secure or hold something tightly in place.
meanings.sent1: The huggers on the belt kept the tools from falling off.
meanings.sent2: The backpack had sturdy huggers to keep the books safe.
meanings.sent3: The sticky huggers on the wall were perfect for hanging up posters.
meanings.sent4: The rope acted as a huggers, keeping the boat tied to the dock.
meanings.sent5: The strong huggers of the clamp held the pieces together firmly.

meanings.definition: A type of clothing that fits snugly around the body.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite huggers to stay warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The athletes prefer huggers for better movement during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cozy huggers felt like a warm hug all day long.
meanings.sent4: Her red huggers hugged her curves perfectly, making her feel confident.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the huggers felt like a second skin.
